pages.title: ℧ Four of Cups ℧
pages.text: Spirit of Blended Pleasure$(br)     ☽ Moon in ♋ Cancer

A young person lays under a tree, three cups set on the grass before them; their expression notwithstanding is one of discontentment, as if the wine of this world had caused weariness only.$(br)  An arm issuing from a cloud offers them another cup, another wine, as if a fairy gift, but they see no consolation therein.$(br)  They seem to be under the after effect of a celebration that happened previously.$(br)  The verdant meadow and

vigorous tree, may suggests that growth and recovery are still possiblities.$(br)  Each suit, each element, carries its own problems and virtues. For Cups, the virtue is love (as well as other deep emotions) but the problem is passivity. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Apathy, boredom, loss through inaction and passivity.
$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Taking action, making a decision. Preventing loss. Novelty, presage.
